column5: OAS again if you are tryin to day trade good luck This is a buy and hold stock After this breaks past low to mid 7s DEPENDING on where oil is I may exit All depends on where oil is and what opec is doing I see a definite short term recovery to 6 if oil stabilizes

TEUM since I assume we might be range bound for a few months I think Ill throw some cash at some oil stocks for a month or so not changing my multi year Teum thesis just these charts are talking to me looking at OAS and CRZO
OAS analysts on Estimize are expecting 849 YoY revenue growth for Q2 down from 3668 in Q1 Reporting 0805 AMCestimizecomintrooaschar
OAS Oasis Petroleum OAS 499 was this weeks top stock market loser declining 7 Expect a Downtrend continuation tickeroncomappnewsSearch

QEP CRZO OAS One of the biggest problem I see everyday in these names is it takes less than 10k shares at any given moment to wipe out the majority of the days gain I see why the Algos short them when it only takes 10 of the Vol to drive it down
